Moo::RenderContextCallback

Moo::RenderContextCallback Class Reference

This class allows controlled release of resources allocated by derived classes. More...

#include <render_context_callback.hpp>

Public Member Functions

virtual void renderContextFini ()=0
 This method must be implemented in derived classes, and should release all dynamic resources it has gathered.
 RenderContextCallback ()
 Constructor.

Static Public Member Functions

static void fini ()
 This static method calls the "clear" method of all registered classes in order to allow them to release their resources.

Detailed Description

This class allows controlled release of resources allocated by derived classes.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::vector< RenderContextCallback * > Moo::RenderContextCallback::Callbacks

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Moo::RenderContextCallback::RenderContextCallback (  ) 

Constructor.

Registers the created class so its resources can be released later.

Member Function Documentation

void Moo::RenderContextCallback::fini (  )  [static]

This static method calls the "clear" method of all registered classes in order to allow them to release their resources.

virtual void Moo::RenderContextCallback::renderContextFini (  )  [pure virtual]

This method must be implemented in derived classes, and should release all dynamic resources it has gathered.

Implemented in Moo::QuickAlloc< ElementSize >, and Moo::FixedListAllocator< ObjectType >.
